name: Black Claw the Minor Vampire
description:
Entered via: Blood rift #20210921
Power level: Creeper
Size: 6 feet/1.83 meters tall
Aspect: Blood
Secondary Aspects: Bone, Unique, Darkness

Black Claw is the most advanced of the Minor Vampires, as even with his lacking mental faculties he’s been able to be blessed by the God of Darkness to manipulate his own shadow, which he uses to create extended claws that lash out like blades to maim his prey before delivering the final blow with his savage teeth. 
---
Minor Vampires are savage, near-mindless revenants that are terrifying shadows of their once-human selves. Thirsting for blood, they maintain personality traits and habits of their past lives, even if they don’t know exactly why they behave as such. While extremely fast and strong, their minds are shattered and often lack dexterity, so often they resort to bladed weapons to hunt.

These Creepers suffer similar weaknesses as mythological vampires - sunlight burns their skin, and massive damage to their heart (through stake or shotgun blast) can send them back to the Abyssal Void. Be weary that due to their secondary aspect of bone, they have a calciferous buildup around their organs, making them slightly more durable than normal humans.
